name: Tiki Tomatoes
description:
The black rain clouds are coming!
Have them water your fields to grow your village,
but don't let them take out the village fire!

Blue bar is mana, used to change wind direction-
Just left click while dragging the mouse.
REd Bar is health.

Models and Particles: Simon Gross

Programming: Shachar Langbeheim

Sound: Hed Gilboa

Additional models:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/tinyfire-vfx-1-0-97898
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/awesome-low-poly-fantasy-clouds-97654
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/stylized-trees-low-poly-49916
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/awesome-low-poly-fantasy-clouds-97654
